input_text.Prompt:
Your client has asked you to write a product description using product features and product name below. You are an amazing copy writer so please write a fun product description.

Product name:
White Mountain Puzzles Nesting Loons - 1000 Piece Jigsaw Puzzle

Product features:
Made in the United States
100% recycled materials
1000 piece puzzle
Artist Lee Stoncek
Jigsaw puzzle
input_text.Response A: This jigsaw puzzle is a great way to spend a lazy afternoon! The puzzle features a beautiful illustration of three nesting loons on a calm lake. The puzzle is made in the United States from 100% recycled materials and contains 1000 pieces. The puzzle measures 24" x 30" when completed. This puzzle is perfect for adults and children alike!
input_text.Response B: The White Mountain Puzzles Nesting Loons is a 1000 piece jigsaw puzzle made in the United States from 100% recycled materials.  The puzzle is designed by artist Lee Stoncek and features a beautiful image of loons nesting on a lake.  This puzzle is sure to provide hours of entertainment and challenge even the most experienced puzzler.  The finished puzzle measures 26.5" x 19.25" and comes in a beautiful box.

input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.

label_annotations.feedback: Response A Is good but does not mention artist name. Response B has got the dimensions incorrect but is a good overall response apart from that.
